## [[Pluto!!]{.pluto2 .Bigger}](https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl) 

...very fun notebook authoring environment for {{< iconify logos:julia size=xl >}} <br>
...you could also just use it as your {{< iconify bi:markdown-fill >}} editor if you wanted<br>to play a bit, although [{{< iconify logos:julia size=xl >}} is needed](https://julialang.org/downloads/)<br>to access locally (see below)

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%"}

### Locally: {#local}

```
julia> using Pkg
julia> Pkg.add("Pluto")
julia> using Pluto
julia> Pluto.run()
```
:::

::: {.column width="5%"}
:::
